top.title: Putin and Trump's envoy set for key Ukraine talks in Moscow
top.summary: Steve Witkoff will hold talks at the Kremlin, after the White House said it was "optimistic" about a breakthrough.

top.title: US Navy admiral ordered second  deadly Venezuela boat strike, White House says
top.summary: The strikes, authorised by Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth, have raised fresh legality questions - but the White House says laws have been followed.

top.title: India tells smartphone makers to put state-run cyber safety app on new devices
top.summary: India wants all smartphone makers to pre-install new devices with a state-owned cyber security app.

top.title: Fashion house Valentino criticised over 'disturbing' AI handbag ads
top.summary: Social media users have called the luxury Italian fashion brand's artificial intelligence-made adverts "cheap" and "lazy".

top.title: 'First of its kind' scanner to study blast trauma
top.summary: It will be able to monitor changes in brain function just minutes after weapon use, scientists say.

top.title: Jorja Smith's record label hits out at 'AI clone' song
top.summary: The label claims Haven's dance hit I Run was made using AI trained on the award-winning singer's voice.
